name: generateSecretKey
description: Generates a secure random key value for use in the encrypt and decrypt functions.

params.name: algorithm
params.description:
The encryption algorithm used to generate the key. 
NOTE: You cannot use `generateSecretKey()` to create a key for the `CFMX_COMPAT` default algorithm in `encrypt()` and `decrypt()` functions.

params.name: keysize
params.description: Number of bits requested in the key for the specified algorithm (when allowed by JDK).

links.title: Generating AES 256 bit Key
links.description: How to enable unlimited strength crypto in Java.

examples.title: Generate an AES 128 bit Key
examples.description: Generate an AES key and use it to encrypt and decrypt a secret.
